title: Redundancy Notification Form
description: Form to notify about proposed redundancies.

components.label: What is their work email address?
components.name: what_is_their_work_email_address

components.content:
If you operate from more than one site, each one is treated separately for notification and consultation purposes.

An establishment is the site where an employee is assigned to work (base).

You must complete a form for each site where 20 or more redundancies are proposed on one form.

components.label: Is the company, establishment or business closing?
components.name: is_the_company_establishment_or_business_closing

components.content:
We need to know the total number of employees across all the establishment(s) where there will be redundancies.

You'll be asked for the proposed number of redundancies next.

components.label: What is the total number of employees across all affected establishments?
components.name: total_number_of_employees

components.label: What is the total number of redundancies you plan to make?
components.name: total_number_of_redundancies
components.hint: You should only be reporting 20 or more redundancies to us on one form

components.content:
You should give:

  • 30 days notice if you're dismissing 20 to 99 employees
  • 45 days notice if you're dismissing 100 employees or more

For more information read our Advance notification of redundancies employer guide (opens in new tab)

components.label: What is the date of the first proposed dismissal?
components.name: date_of_first_proposed_dismissal

components.label: What is the date of the last proposed dismissal?
components.name: date_of_last_proposed_dismissal
components.hint: If this date is not known, please give an estimate. You can email us later with correct date.

components.label: If you have given less than the required 30/45 day notification period, explain why
components.name: notification_period_explanation
components.hint: Enter N/A if you have given 30/45 day notification

pages.title: How and Why Redundancies are Happening

components.content: We need to know why you making redundancies.

components.label: What are the reasons for the redundancies?
components.name: reasons_for_redundancies
